channel.title: Item + Item = New item. hmm. :b
channel.description:
[color=navy]Well. I thought I knew it. But obviously I failed (or else I wouldn't be making a topic, would i.):D (If you didn't catch on from the title...I'm trying to use an item on an item and make a new one.)
Soo... under case 129: [code] else if (useItemID == ID && onItemID == ID) { sendMessage("Message!"); addItem(ID, #); }[/code] I guess that's wrong. I've tried switching stuff around likeee... [code] else if (ItemID == ID && useItemID == ID)[/code] but...yeah: no.
(I [b]did[/b] search around a bit for this on the forums and in meh client.java. just fyi.)
So it's just the uhmm. useItemID & onItemID. Really just the onItemID. It's not right. :3 whattt/howww do I do. whatever it is. :)

item.title: Item + Item = New item. hmm. :b
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Just remember that if you use tutorials, there methods may look different than yours, and if that is the case you need to spiff it up a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Item + Item = New item. hmm. :b
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

make something out of this…

if(playerHasItem(ITEMIDGOESHERE, 1) && playerHasItem(ITEMIDGOESHERE, 1)){ deleteItem (ITEMIDGOESHERE, 1) && deleteItem (ITEMIDGOESHERE, 1); addItem(ITEMIFGOESHERE, 1)

Read full topic

item.title: Item + Item = New item. hmm. :b
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Search for “case 53:”

Under that add this:

} else if (itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1631) { if (playerLevel[12] >= 75) { deleteItem(1631, getItemSlot(1631), 1); addItem(1615, 1); addSkillXP((1500 * playerLevel[12]), 12); resetanim = 0x733; sendMessage( "You cut the Dragonstone"); } else { sendMessage( "You need a crafting level of 75 to cut this gem!"); }

Change the code to how you want it.

Read full topic

item.title: Item + Item = New item. hmm. :b
item.dc:creator: @Bells Bells(:
item.description:
@Bells wrote:

[color=navy]Well. I thought I knew it.
But obviously I failed (or else I wouldn’t be making a topic, would i.)
(If you didn’t catch on from the title…I’m trying to use an item on an item and make a new one.)

Soo… under case 129:

else if (useItemID == ID && onItemID == ID) { sendMessage("Message!"); addItem(ID, #); }
I guess that’s wrong. I’ve tried switching stuff around likeee…

				else if (ItemID == ID && useItemID == ID)

but…yeah: no.

(I did search around a bit for this on the forums and in meh client.java. just fyi.)

So it’s just the uhmm. useItemID & onItemID. Really just the onItemID. It’s not right. :3
whattt/howww do I do. whatever it is.

Read full topic
